name: Delivery to Nowhere
description:
A delivery game where you leave pizza in a ghost town. You receive a call but nobody expects you, so you just end your shift or wait to be attacked by evil ghosts. 

This game was made under 48 hours in collaboration with LeRenardBlanc for the Kenney Game Jam 2020.

Use your explosive hot chilli pizzas to defend yourself by pressing left mouse button and don't forget to deliver pizza by pressing right mouse button in the marked spots.

Good luck and fun delivery.
